mapper.sql: a.id, a.id AS "user.id", a.company_id AS "user.company.id", a.office_id AS "user.office.id", a.login_name AS "user.loginName", a.password, a.no, a.name AS "user.name", a.email, a.phone, a.mobile, a.user_type, a.login_ip, a.login_date, a.remarks, a.login_flag, a.has_permission, a.permission_key, a.photo, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag
mapper.select: SELECT , b.team_type AS "teamType" FROM sys_user a left join ccm_org_team b on a.id = b.user_id and b.del_flag = 0 WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND a.id not in ('1','2') ORDER BY a.name
